1506060.name: QFIELD
1506060.description:
QFIELD
Grab your rocket launcher and score some goals against your opponents in a fast paced first person soccer-shooter match in a beautiful arena environment.

Streamlined Game Mechanics
The streamlined design and deep gameplay mechanics are the key features of QFIELD. All abilities and moves were refined and balanced for months and complement each other perfectly. The game is very inviting and easy to get into while offering many hours of fun mastering it.

Online PvP & Single-player
Aside from the online multiplayer PvP against your friends or opponents from all over the world the game offers a great single-player experience. You can practice for your next match through a carefully crafted campaign of offline challenges, or you can fight against AI opponents of various difficulty that are hard to discern from real players.

Character Customization
Customize your character and various other visual elements like rocket explosion theme to your personal taste and build a unique online appearance. Individual items are unlocked as you gather XP while mastering the game and so every match or completed challenge counts.
1506060.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
